text: China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC ), established in July 1949, is a mass organization composed of nationwide associations of writers and artists. CFLAC is one of the founders of CPPCC (Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference).Introduction of CFLAC Cflac.org.cn CFLAC includes artist associations which are involved in such activities as academic studies and discussion, performances, exhibitions, and competitions.China Federation of Literary and Art Circles Chinaculture.org 16, January 2008 ==Branches== *China Artists Association () *China Film Association () *Chinese Musicians Association () *China Television Artists Association () *China Writers Association ()CWA changed its translated name , China Writers Association.
